1.label: Door Window Sensor will send Notification Report when the supported event is triggered.

2.label: Basic Set. Door Window Sensor will send Basic Set when the sensor body and magnet removed or combined.

options.label: Send BASIC SET VALUE = 0xFF/0x00 to nodes associated with group 2 when the door is opened/close.
Send BASIC SET VALUE = 0x00/0xFF to nodes associated with group 2 when the door is opened/close.

paramInformation.label: Turn on LED when the Door Window Sensor is triggered.
